db:section.db:title: Synopsis
db:section.db:para: If versionless commands are disabled, use qt6_disable_unicode_defines() instead. It supports the same set of arguments as this command.

db:section.db:title: Description
db:section.db:para: In Qt 6, the UNICODE and _UNICODE compiler definitions are set by default for targets that link against Qt modules. This is in line with the qmake behavior, but it is a change compared to the CMake API behavior in Qt 5. Calling qt_disable_unicode_defines() on a target prevents these compiler definitions from being automatically set.
